name: Check Graveyard
_source: s;Simon;The graves seem disturbed.{w}{br}That's a bit strange...{w} and unsettling.
s;Vincent;Think the bandits around here have resorted to grave robbing?
s;Simon;I'm really not sure.{w}{br}But let's, uh, back away from here.
s;Simon;I'm about to pass out from the stench.
